google_play_reviews.content: "Get paid" it says. Yeah, right. Unless you're an app developer and understand things like APIs and app tokens, and have built your own payment app to link to it, you're not GETTING paid. Why isn't there a simple "link bank account" option for invoice payments to get deposited to? I don't know who their target demographic is, but I'm CLEARLY not it. I'm just a simple cab company owner, thought this would help me send invoices to my clients. Doesn't seem like it and I spent ALL DAY with it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
We're very sorry for the trouble and to see you go. To accept payments online you need to integrate with a payment gateway, such as PayPal, Stripe, or other options that can be integrated [literally] with 1-click.

If you would like to give us another try, I'll be glad to offer support and provide any tutorials as needed to assist.
